content: प्रश्रयः, --प्रश्रयणं {@--1@} Respect, courtesy, civility, politeness, respectful or courteous behaviour, humility; समागतैः प्रश्रयनम्रमूर्तिभिः <ls>Śi. 12. 33</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 70</ls>, <ls n="R. 10.">83</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 23</ls>; सप्रश्रयं respectfully, modestly. {@--2@} Love, affection, regard; <ls>Pt. 2. 2.</ls>
